definitions: To hit someone or something with your hand or a weapon.
To refuse to work as a form of organised protest, typically in an attempt to obtain concessions from their employer.
To occur to someone suddenly or unexpectedly.
To produce a musical note or sound by hitting something.
To ignite a match by rubbing it against a rough surface.
examples: He struck the ball with great force.
The workers decided to strike for better pay.
She struck a chord on the piano.
He struck a match to light the candle.
